subject: New development for your bes
body:
New development for your best interest.
I have been connected to a financier who is ready to sponsor your trip
for you to go and sign the release documents of your funds. The
financier will buy your flight ticket, take care of your hotel
accommodation and feeding throughout your round trip.
If you are interested send me copy of your international passport and
we start from there.
Ray Scot.

subject: Re:   New development for your bes
body:
Hello Ray Scot,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I must say, it sounds quite interesting. Can you please provide me with more details about the funds and the purpose of signing the release documents? I want to make sure I fully understand what this entails before proceeding further.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: New development for your bes
body:
Get back to me for more details also send your details in full.

Full names
address
cell phone
copy of your ID or international passport.

subject: Re: New development for your bes
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm interested in learning more about the details you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some additional information on what this is regarding?

Best wishes,
Mary
